Saying you "lost your son" when he was diagnosed autistic is horrific. Autism is not a death sentence, unlike, oh idk, measles, for instance? Autism does NOT make your child any lesser.
EVEN IF vaccines caused autism, wouldn't you rather have an autistic kid than a dead one?!https://twitter.com/ShireenQudosi/status/1139023857912729601 …

1140003364048166913.text: These people think that Autism leaves you, basically, hospitalized when the only form of Autism that leaves you needed someone to watch over you is low functioning Autism, and that is so rare, you are more likely to die from vaccines then get low functioning Autism

1140014488684568577.text: Baaarrrrffff! Lost her son because he has a neurological disorder? I fucking hate these types of parents who think this way if their child isn't exactly what they expected
